name: neglect
description: Neglect SDK â€” real-time market + token intelligence for Solana.
author: Neglect

scripts.generate:sdk: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $GITHUB_TOKEN" -L "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NeglectApp/api-gateway/main/config/routes.oas.json" -o routes.oas.json && node scripts/prune-oas.js && npx openapi --client fetch --input routes.oas.json --output src/generated && node scripts/strip-blocked-methods.js'
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run generate:sdk && npm run generate:shortcuts && npm run build
